verbs.description: In the past ten weeks , lawyer Michael Avenatti , who [V: is] representing porn star Stormy Daniels in her lawsuits against President Trump , has been interviewed a staggering 147 times on broadcast and cable news shows . More than half of those interviews ( 74 ) were on CNN , which almost certainly makes Avenatti the most ubiquitous guest in the network ’s history . No guest — not Donald
